pullrequest.title: Andrei Haidu GSOC fluid plugin with Fluidix

content.raw:
our thoughts were:

 1. not having to pull in yet another repository seemed attractive mainly because there's less cmake wrangling.
 1. being in the same cmake project made it easier to create unit tests. We had *issues* (required more cmake wrangling) when trying to make unit tests for fluids simulation as a separate repository.
 1. make development process easier (less cmake/system path wrangling).  Develop / build from source from one repository is probably easier to manage than building from source from multiple repositories.
